title: Barikui1
author: Barikui1
content: My country people I dy hail ona inside dis hot afternoon, Wetin I wan talk about na how we fit stop stop godfatherism for we country naija because e dy really worrysome say most of this politicians go dy do anyhow for we country and believe say nothing go happen because say na him boy dy in power, an the sad part be say dat him boy wey be governor or presido no go do anything because na him godfather be dat.Make we look at wetin shele between governor fubara of River state and him godfather wike, wike just wan to dy for Abuja dy control wetin happen for the state as if him still dy in power, even the fubara self don tire for the whole settings, the only day him go against him godfather because of the interest of the people, wike assemble all him catel men dem for the state with the intention of forcing fubara out of office.I no just know where dis country dy go now because it's getting out of hand.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: Pls similar topic of this nature has already been created, it is advisable to check the topics on the forum thoroughly before a thread, i advice you rather lock this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5472289.0

comments.author: Chilwell
comments.body: Quote from: Barikui1 on November 04, 2023, 11:44:52 AM.Refer back to the link giving to you by Richbased Quote from: Richbased on November 04, 2023, 11:48:34 AMPls similar topic of this nature has already been created, it is advisable to check the topics on the forum thoroughly before a thread, i advice you rather lock this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5472289.0lock this thread and continue with the above link, to lock the thread Scroll down, at the lower left side, you will see lock topic tap on it to lock.
